category: National Pension Review Committee Operation Regulations/Article 14 (Request for submission of evidence and return, etc.)
contents: Article 14 (Request for submission of evidence and return, etc.) ① When the review committee deems it necessary for the review, it requests the applicant or relevant person to submit evidence according to the request for submission of evidence in Form No. 7, or the submission of evidence in Form 8. The claimant or the person concerned may appear and ask questions according to the attendance request form. Revised on December 21, 2020, September 16, 2022. ② When the chairman of the review committee deems it necessary for the review, he may control the access of the claimant or related persons to the meeting room. ③ Actual expenses may be paid within the budget to the claimant or related person who appears pursuant to the provisions of paragraph 1. ④ After making a decision, when an application for return of evidence is made pursuant to the application for return of evidence in Form No. 9, the Corporation shall return the original documents, books, objects, and other evidence submitted by the claimant to the claimant without delay. . Revised 2022. 9. 16.
